body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Deals Inc. My name is William Harris. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Amber. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to buy a new car. Can you help me with that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! To better assist you, could you please provide me with the make and model of the car you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in a blue four door sedan.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amber. Lastly, could you provide me with your contact number and email address so we can follow up with you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My contact number is five five five - two three four - nine zero one zero, and my email is amber.hill@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amber. We will reach out to you soon with available options. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, William. I'm looking forward to hearing from you. Goodbye.
